Reviews.Title: “A very good choice in an excellent location”
Reviews.Author: duntiblaesnob
Reviews.Content: The location is excellent, quiet yet central, in a side street just a few paces from the Champs Elysees. If you want to be close to the most famous shopping street, the arc de Triomphe and the metro without paying a fortune then this hotel is hard to beat. The hotel has a cozy atmosphere with friendly, efficient staff and decent sized rooms. The price is favourable for the 8th arondissement.

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Dalia_Ghaly
Reviews.Content: the hotel is so nice, helpful staff , perfect location , surrounded by lots of samll resturants and a lively area but I still prefer the latin quarter area

Reviews.Title: “Best location great staff”
Reviews.Author: Dilo-Jake
Reviews.Content: First visit to the hotel. Rooms a bit cramped as I am spoiled by this hotels sister (La Residence Foch). But this hotel is half a block off the Champs and just around the corner from the Metro (George V). Rooms are clean and well maintained but a little tired. Breakfast is done well. I would easily come back to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful, Clean, Parisian”
Reviews.Author: MaireGirl
Reviews.Content: I loved this hotel! Location fantastic, I use public transit and it was a two minute walk to tube! Best shopping in Paris , steps away. The front desk were pleasant and helpful with booking train tickets and providing time schedules. If you are a walker, you are 5 minutes to the Arc de Triomphe and the Effiel tower. Coffee and Tea were provided in the room. The bathroom was large with amenities. Please not I am a seasoned European traveler and it's not the Four Seasons, but it exceeded all our expectations for the night.

Reviews.Title: “Absolute Perfection”
Reviews.Author: zensurfergirl
Reviews.Content: My fiance and I just returned from a long weekend in Paris. This was our first visit and we could not have been more pleased with our stay at the Hotel Galileo. We came in on the red eye from Chicago at 7am Paris time. Upon our arrival at the hotel (midmorning) we asked if we could store our luggage and freshen up in the restroom. Not only did they graciously receive us, they also checked us into our room about 30 minutes later, which was far above and beyond our expectation. I realize this depends somewhat on the availability of the room, but it certainly also speaks to the personalized service provided at this property. The room was quaint and clean, exactly what we needed. Overall this hotel has great charm. The mattress was very firm, but as we only stayed two nights this was not a problem for us. We did not have a chance to eat downstairs, but overall the hotel seemed very well kept and managed. The woman at the front desk assisted us with a map and recommended many wonderful sights to see. She, along with every staff member we encountered, was incredibly kind and helpful. I must also say that the location of this hotel is incredible. About 1.5 blocks from Champs Elysees, and just a few blocks from the Arc de Triomphe. We dined and shopped very easily within just a few blocks, and walked to many monuments and points of interest. The George V Metro stop is extremely close to Hotel Galileo, but the weather was so fantastic that we opted to walk. This was without a doubt the best way to see Paris for the first time. I highly recommend this hotel, and very much feel that it deserves the wonderful reviews it received thus far. We will absolutely be back!

Reviews.Title: “Cute place, great location!”
Reviews.Author: SUNSHINEVACA
Reviews.Content: I stayed one night while I was on a day trip from London. Brilliant location walking distance to everywhere I wanted to go. Cute litte room that was very clean. The front desk help was super nice and helpful. Would recommend this place to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Large Room and good location”
Reviews.Author: lucafromferrara
Reviews.Content: I stayed one night in this hotel during a business trip. I can fully confirm the tripadvisor average score. Location is really good, just a few steps away from the champs elisees, in a very up-scale neighborhood. The price I got was pretty decent, considering Paris and the location. The room was surprisingly large for Parisian standards, plenty of towels (good quality) in the bathroom and a good stock of bathroom amenities. The bed was confortable and heating was ok (not to hot, not too cold). The room was quiet. I also appreciated the (American style) coffee maker with coffee and tea. I did not try the breakfast because it was too expensive (it's much better to go to a street cafè on the Champs Elisees). This is a good, solid hotel with really good price/quality ratio. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Very impressed! Will be back again!”
Reviews.Author: Belle_Ame_4
Reviews.Content: I stumbled on Hotel Galileo through Trip Advisor and have to say I was extremely happy with my stay. At the time I was struggling to get around with a back injury so the location was absolutely sensational. The sightseeing tour bus stop was on the Champs Elysées at the end of the street and the metro station was very close also. The room was very clean and nice and quiet (so much so I slept in one morning)! What sets this hotel apart from many I stayed in during my trip was the staff. They were extremely knowledgable and were able to answer pretty much any question I asked - or knew who to ask for the answer, they booked tickets to the shows I wanted to see and also helped me out where possible knowing I had an injury to work with. Hotel Galileo staff were all round some of the best staff I have experienced in all my travels. Great job and I look forward to seeing you again in 2012 or 2013 - whenever I make the trip from Australia again!

Reviews.Title: “Four nights in Paris”
Reviews.Author: SnOOpy13-12
Reviews.Content: Excellent position and price/quality ratio. Breakfast not reccomended (too expensive).

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel in excellent location. Very helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: fr0764
Reviews.Content: Hotel Galileo is a small hotel located close to the Champs Elysées. We were very pleased with our one night stay. The price/quality ratio is very good for Paris standards. Our room was located at the side of the street, but there was no bothering noise. The room was clean, not too small and there was a nice bathroom. We would certainly go back there.

Reviews.Title: “beyond expectation”
Reviews.Author: masaidiff
Reviews.Content: my family n i were looking for a value for money hotel within walking distance to champs elysees.we found this perfect hotel n booked thru its website 2 months earlier n got a discount.we stayed for 3 nights for 2 rooms.it was opposite hugo boss store n LV.for its price,we feel like staying at home.very comfortable,warm bathroom with a nice towel heater,n most importantly clean n nicely fragrant.definitely a warm welcome after a 14 hour flight from malaysia.the breakfast served was very nice and complete n omellete were made by order.the staff was friendly n helpful in giving directions n places to visit in paris.this hotel definitely exceed our expectations,n will stay here again next time we're in paris.

Reviews.Title: “great little hotel in an excellent location”
Reviews.Author: curransarah
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I stayed here for 4 days in august , and had a wonderful stay. The management was friendly and helpful, our room was spotless and the breakfast was included in our room rate, and it was the perfect start to our days, eggs fresh coffee and of course croissant ! The bathroom was a nice size and our windows opened for fresh air, although the room was air conditioned the weather was not hot so we enjoyed the open air. The hotel is located just 2 blocks back from the Champs, and the side street was quite and nice, and the restaurants the staff recommended were all good. All in all i would go back and stay here again, and have recommended it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel in Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Andyt279
Reviews.Content: This was our first time visiting Paris and we were not sure what to expect or where to stay. Spent several days looking at Trip advisor and came across this Hotel, close to the Champs-Elysses and l'arc de triomphe it proved to be a fantastic location. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful, giving advice on where to eat and how to get there. The Hotel itself is quite small but that added to the charm. Our room was more than adaquate, clean with all the amenities you would expect, including free wi-fi. All in all this hotel added to our fantastic stay in Paris. Would definately stay there again and would recommend to all.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: rosyg
Reviews.Content: Lovely hotel near l'arc de triomphe. Very clean with helpful receptionist. The rooms are a bit small but very comfortable with a tv, mini bar and safe. George V metro is only about 100mts far.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel it a great location”
Reviews.Author: Shake84
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for 2 nights about 2 weeks ago and absolutely loved it. The room was spacious (as was the bathroom), the location was amazing (on a quiet street off of the main shopping street) and the staff were always friendly and helpful. They have free wifi in the hotel as well as a computer (just one) with a printer that is free for guests to use. The only problem though was that the computer was in french (the keyboard was completely different), so it took longer to use. All in all, I was very happy with my choice.

Reviews.Title: “Value for money in an excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Auzzy87
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at this hotel and found it to be excellently located and close to the major tourist attractions and the subway sytem. The rooms are clean with simple decoration and the staff are very helpful and friendly. We did not eat in at the hotel but the staff provided us with some great advice on where to find good food. Concidering the price of most decent hotels in Paris I though this hotel offered very good value for money and I would be happy to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “hide gem in Europe”
Reviews.Author: ANA A
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at this fabulous place in Paris two weeks ago and we just l-o-v-e-d it, from the incredible room to the delicious breakfast. The entire place is cleaned and well decorated. Champs Elysses is just around the corner and Celine gave us valuable tips to enjoy the city. That was beyond our expectations and honestly, I couldn't have better memories of my first time in Paris. We really had the time of our lives there especially because everybody is so dedicated and put love and care in everything they do. Keep doing this excellent job, guys! That's precious and priceless!

Reviews.Title: “Value for money - More than expected”
Reviews.Author: xeaglex21
Reviews.Content: Hotel location: It suits perfectly our needs - 100 meters from Champs Elysee Hotel staff: Friendly and willing to assist Hotel rooms: Probably newly renovated - Air-condition in the room was not noisy at all compared to other hotels I stayed - Size of the room: As a expected for 3* hotel Breakfast: Included in the price therefore no problem at all - If it will not in the future (because this is an offer for July and August), it does not worth the price of €13. However, quality of food was good. You do not expect a 5* rich breakfast for €13 but a bit more. Overall comment: A comfortable and nice 3 nights stay...

Reviews.Title: “Very nice stay”
Reviews.Author: kac227
Reviews.Content: I was lucky enough to secure a room with Hotel Galileo at the last minute, and was very happy with my stay there. While some people have commented that the rooms are small, mine was quite sizable, especially compared to other European hotels I've stayed in. The room was a little dark but nicely decorated and very clean. The bed was quite comfortable as well. The room came with a little fridge, free internet, a safe, and an iron and ironing board. The bathroom looked like it had been recently redone and was very nice and very, very large. My only complaint is the lack of a shower curtain, but I hear that's pretty common in Paris hotels. The hotel staff were very helpful and very kind, and went out of their way to see if there was anything I needed. The location is excellent, just off the Champs-Elysées, and very near to two metro stops as well as a number of restaurants, banks, and shops. I would definitely stay in this hotel next time I'm in Paris!

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and Clean Hotel near the Etoile”
Reviews.Author: BassmanChicag0
Reviews.Content: This is a very reasonably priced and clean hotel on a quiet street in the high-rent district of Paris' right bank; the staff is very polite and helpful. The rooms are small but quiet . It is an easy walk from the Arc de Triomphe, the shopping of Champs Elysees, and countless restaurants in the area. The breakfast is fine and the staff cordial. Highly recommended for its value, staff, and location.

Reviews.Title: “Definitely would stay there again”
Reviews.Author: Jennifer580518
Reviews.Content: My brother and I stayed 2 nights at this hotel after a 5 week trip around France and Italy. We decided to spend our last 2 days in Paris close to everything. I couldn't believe how close to the Champs Elysees it was. One minute walk and we were right there. Shops, restaurants right at our doorstep. The people who run the Hotel are very friendly, knowledgeable, and very helpful. The hotel is very clean, comfortable and quite reasonably priced. If I ever go to Paris again (which I hope to) I would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel”
Reviews.Author: Mdoh
Reviews.Content: Fantastic location, good value for money, I will definitely be staying there again

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, clean, friendly staff and ideal location”
Reviews.Author: Michellere
Reviews.Content: My mother and I stayed there for a week and loved it! The breakfast was so convenient and the staff there, attentive. With free Internet, air conditioning, a safe and a mini bar, the room contained all the essentials. My only disappointment was in it's size...it was a little small which meant having to be super organized with our things. However, we managed and would definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful service,best location,Great value.”
Reviews.Author: Clydebull
Reviews.Content: Just finished a short stay.The staff went out of there way to help(restaurant reservations,free wi-fi,great location-2blocks off Champs-Elys'ees.located near George V metro stop.Great value-Hope to go back soon.

Reviews.Title: “juste”
Reviews.Author: demide
Reviews.Content: Good position, friendly personal, right price. Position near arc de triomphe

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Galileo
HotelInfo.Address: 54 rue Galilee | 08 Arr., 75008 Paris, France
